name: company_name_match
description: Identify redundant or duplicate customer information within a database or CRM system as a basis for matching records when combining multiple data sources, or as a searching mechanism to find “similar” results of company names using the similarity keys as the basis for a match.

category.desciption: This category type indicates which set of Machine Learning and matching algorithms to make use of based on type of data content. Use 'company','individual',or 'address'.

apikey.desciption: Login to www.interzoid.com to obtain your API Key. It is how we track and manage usage. If you do not yet have one, register at www.interzoid.com/register-api-account.

source.desciption: Source of data, such as 'CSV', 'Snowflake', 'Postgres', etc. See source list on interactive page for entire list.

connection.desciption: Connection string to access database, or in the case of a CSV or TSV file, use the full URL of the location of the file.

table.desciption: Table name to access the source data. Use 'CSV' or 'TSV' for delimited text files.

column.desciption: Column name within the table to access the source data. This is a number for CSV or TSV files, starting with number 1 from the left side of the file.

json.desciption: Set to true (&json=true) to display the output formatted as JSON.

html.desciption: Set to true (&html=true) to pad line breaks into the output results for better readability in a browser when run from the address bar.

name: gutendex
description: return information about books in gutendex.

author_year_start.desciption: Find books with at least one author alive in a given range of years,can be a number like 1800.

author_year_end.desciption: Find books with at least one author alive in a given range of years,can be a number like 1800.

copyright.desciption: Find books with a certain copyright status,can be true, false, null or the threes combination, use comma to separate multiple words like 'true,false'.

ids.desciption: List books with Project Gutenberg ID numbers in a given list of numbers.Use comma to separate them like'11,12,13'.

languages.desciption: Find books in any of a list of languages. English,for example, can be written as en. Use comma to separate them like'fr,fi'.

mime_type.desciption: Find books with a given MIME type.Take 'text%2F' for example, it returns books with types text/html, text/plain; charset=us-ascii, etc.

search.desciption: Search author names and book titles with given words.'dickens%20great' can be an example.

sort.desciption: Use this to sort books.It can be 'ascending','descending','popular'.'popular' is the default.

topic.desciption: Search for a case-insensitive key-phrase in books' bookshelves or subjects.'children'can be an example.

name: poetry
description: Returns information about poetry and its author.

input_field.desciption: It can be one of 'author','title','lines','linecount'.'linecount' means lines of a poem.Use ',' to separate multiple words if needed.

search_term.desciption: It relates to input field.For example, if input_field is 'author', search_term can be 'Shakespeare'. Use ';' to separate multiple words if needed.

search_type.desciption: It is optional. If search_type = 'abs', match search_term exactly when searching input_field.'Default' or empty, at the contrary, match <search term> with any part of <input field> when searching.

output_field.desciption: It is optional. If multiple words are needed, use ',' to separate them. 'author','title','lines','linecount' can be chosen.

name: rent_estimate
description: Get accurate and current estimated rent for a property, based on millions of records in Realty Mole’s real estate property database.

address.desciption: There should be at least one not NULL parameter in 'address','latitude' and 'longitude'.

latitude.desciption: There should be at least one not NULL parameter in 'address','latitude' and 'longitude'.

longitude.desciption: There should be at least one not NULL parameter in 'address','latitude' and 'longitude'.

propertyType.desciption: The property type of the house.

bedrooms.desciption: It means the number of bedrooms.

bathrooms.desciption: It means the number of bathrooms.

daysOld.desciption: It means the maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1.

compCount.desciption: It means the number of comparable listings returned by the API, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
